Amazon ERC: Tips for logging into the A to Z app:
1. Enter your Amazon Login (find this at the top of your badge) then click GET STARTED
2. Select your mobile number then click CONTINUE
3. You will receive a verification code via text. If you don't use it within 5 minutes, you'll have to request a new one.
4. Select the ‘Remember this device’ checkbox to skip code verification for 30 days if you are using your own device.
For more FAQs, click ‘View our FAQ’ at the bottom of the A to Z login page.
